name: voilib
description: Voilib is a self-hosted media library and catalog web app, aimed at organizing video or audio collections with metadata, search, and categorization.
features: Media cataloging: Organize video and audio collections with metadata and descriptions.
Search functionality: Find media quickly using full-text search across titles and metadata.
Category organization: Group media by genre, type, or custom categories for easy browsing.
Metadata management: Add and edit metadata including titles, descriptions, and tags.
Collection views: Browse your media library with list, grid, or detailed views.
Cover images: Display cover art or thumbnails for visual media identification.
Filtering: Filter media by category, tags, or other attributes to find specific items.
Web interface: Access your media catalog through a clean web interface from any device.
Privacy-focused: Keep all media information on your own server with complete control.
Import tools: Import media information from files or external sources.
Export capabilities: Export catalog data for backup or migration purposes.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resources for personal media collections.
